ComicInfo.Summary: Deck the Halls and grab your bulbs! It's holiday horror at its finest with the final issue to the comeback Christmas story of the year! Psycho-Santa-killer Billy rocked the small town of Egg Nogg, Utah almost 40 years ago - little did they know he was just getting warmed up! In the bloody aftermath of the explosion at Ira's Toy Store, Parker and Prudence are trying to piece together Billy's bloody path of vengeance, which leads them back to the place where it all started - Saint Mary's Orphanage! It's a blood-soaked showdown with the shocking reveal of the true person behind all of Billy's rage that fans will never see coming! Who says you can't go home for the horrordays?!
